ModMetaData.name: Survival Tools Reborn
ModMetaData.author: Jellypowered
ModMetaData.description:
Current version: v1.6 (August 2025)
Adds survival tools and the need to manage them to RimWorld.
• Colonists work far less efficiently without the correct tool • Tools can be carried in inventory or equipped in hand • Hardcore Mode: pawns cannot perform certain jobs at all without the proper tool • Automatic tool pickup and swap logic before jobs • Smarter detection of job–tool requirements (WorkGiver & job fallbacks) • Acquire tools through crafting, trade, or loot • Different materials affect durability and effectiveness • Tools wear down with use and can break • Configurable mod settings with debugging options
Originally by XeoNovaDan. Updated and maintained with permission for RimWorld 1.6.
